attributes.action: bring back the National Reserves Army for Young People not engaged in Learning, Training or Employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any young person aged between 16 - 25 who is not currently working, on an apprenticeship or at college/university in education and has no valid reason should be made to enrol in the army.  This would dramatically reduce the number of crimes committed and reduce the need of the Youth Justice Board and Probation Service would

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
